channel.title: Spawn Help (Is it possible?)
channel.description:
Hello guys, I am currently running a spawn server with an InsidiaX based source. I would like to know if it is possible to change everything from cash to PKP.
For example,
-Staking PKP -Dicing PKP -MOST IMPORTANT - Being able to receive a PKP reward instead of a cash reward for voting.
If any of those are possible ^, please pm me or tell me below. If you can please provide the code with an explanation,
thanks.

item.title: Spawn Help (Is it possible?)
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

You would need to change the implementation of the shops, since they traditionally use items.

Read full topic

item.title: Spawn Help (Is it possible?)
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Yes itâ€™s possible. Search through ShopHandler.java and whatever other files include adding or decreasing money.
